title: ポインタのポインタ2
question: ???に入るのはなに
source:
<color=#da70d6>#include</color> <color=#ce9178><stdio.h></color>

<color=#358cd6>void</color> replace<color=#ffd700>(</color>int** x, int** y<color=#ffd700>)</color><color=#ffd700>{</color>
  <color=#358cd6>int</color> *z = *x;
  *x = *y;
  *y = z;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>

<color=#358cd6>int</color> main<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ffd700>)</color>
<color=#ffd700>{</color>
  <color=#358cd6>int</color> i = 10;
  <color=#358cd6>int</color> j = 20;
  <color=#358cd6>int</color> *a = &i;
  <color=#358cd6>int</color> *b = &j;
  replace<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ff0000>???</color><color=#ffd700>)</color>;
  printf<color=#ffd700>(</color><color=#ce9178>"%d"</color>,*b<color=#ffd700>)</color>;
  <color=#c586c0>return</color> 0;
<color=#ffd700>}</color>
